title: When, my Saviour, shall I be

verses.text: When, my Saviour, shall I be Perfectly restored in thee? Poor and vile in my own eyes, Only in thy wisdom wise?
Only thee content to know, Ignorant of all below? Only guided by thy light? Only mighty in thy might?
Fully in my life express All the heights of holiness; Sweetly let my spirit prove All the depths of perfect love.
